title: The Root Trackside
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Vegan options include falafel burger (request vegan), bbq tofu (request vegan), quinoa salad, french fries, sweet potato fries, some salads, soups and more. Vegan burger also available and is made of crispy fried black bean quinoa burger with creamy tofu mayo served on their vegan bun.They try to have vegan and vegetarian options daily. Located near Elon University.
